agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-007: Implement display modes (headless/minimal/developer). Created DisplayManager class with HeadlessDisplayDriver, MinimalDisplayDriver, DeveloperDisplayDriver. Added StatusInfo/AlertInfo dataclasses, callback support, runtime mode switching. 76 new tests. 506+ total tests passing.

agents.name: Agent2
agents.note: Completed US-009: Implement shutdown command mechanism. Created ShutdownCommand class with PID detection, SIGTERM sending, graceful shutdown wait, GPIO button trigger support, and Raspberry Pi power off option. 59 tests passing. 565+ total tests.
